B

BattleAPI - Interface in org.battlenight.api
Represents the API for accessing BattleNight singletons.

C

ConfigFile - Enum in org.battlenight.api.configuration
Represents all configuration files used by the core plugin.
Configuration - Interface in org.battlenight.api.configuration
Represents the manager for all configuration, storage and message files used by the core plugin.

D

debug(String, Object...) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.message.Messenger
Prints a debug message with arguments to the console as long as debugging is enabled.

F

format(String, Object...) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.message.Messenger
Formats a message with arguments, returning the formatted message.

G

get(ConfigFile) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.configuration.Configuration
Gets the requested FileConfiguration by ConfigFile
getByName(String) - Static method in enum org.battlenight.api.configuration.ConfigFile
Gets the configuration file based off the specified name.
getConfiguration() - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.BattleAPI
Gets the current Configuration singleton.
getMessenger() - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.BattleAPI
Gets the current Messenger singleton.
getName() - Method in enum org.battlenight.api.configuration.ConfigFile
Gets the name of this ConfigFile.

L

logError(String, Object...) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.message.Messenger
Prints an error message with arguments to the console.
logInfo(String, Object...) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.message.Messenger
Prints an info message with arguments to the console.
logWarning(String, Object...) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.message.Messenger
Prints a warning message with arguments to the console.

M

Messenger - Interface in org.battlenight.api.message
Represents the manager for messaging, both logging and player chat.

R

reload() - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.BattleAPI
Soft reloads the BattleNight singletons.
reload() - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.configuration.Configuration
Reloads all configuration files.
reload(ConfigFile) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.configuration.Configuration
Loads the specified ConfigFile from it's file location
reload() - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.message.Messenger
Reloads the configured messages.

S

save(ConfigFile) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.configuration.Configuration
Saves the specified ConfigFile to it's file location
send(CommandSender, String, Object...) - Method in interface org.battlenight.api.message.Messenger
Sends a message with arguments to the specified CommandSender.

V

Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
